parameters.name: EventName
parameters.description:
The name of the alert event.

> You can call the [DescribeSuspEvents](~~DescribeSuspEvents~~) operation to query the names of alerts events.

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The ID of the request source. Set the value to sas.

parameters.name: IncidentTime
parameters.description: The time when the alert event was first detected.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request. The value of this parameter is specified by the system.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the vertex. You can call the [DescribeTraceInfoDetail](~~DescribeTraceInfoDetail~~) operation to query the types of vertexes.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the server. You can call the [DescribeSuspEvents](~~DescribeSuspEvents~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
